MH1.name: "A Song of Just Fire"
MH1.text:
When "A Song of Just Fire" enters the battlefield, each opponent gains 10 life.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a verse counter on "A Song of Just Fire", then it deals damage equal to the number of verse counters on it to target player or planeswalker.

MH1.name: "It's Clobberin' Time!"
MH1.text:
Target creature you control becomes a green Wurm with power and toughness 6/4 until end of turn.
Overload {4}{G}{G}

MH1.name: Abominable Treefolk
MH1.text:
Trample
Abominable Treefolk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow permanents you control.
When Abominable Treefolk enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

MH1.name: Astral Drift
MH1.text:
Whenever you cycle Astral Drift or cycle another card while Astral Drift is on the battlefield, you may exile target creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

MH1.name: Cabal Therapist
MH1.text:
Menace
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, choose a nonland card name, then target player reveals their hand and discards all cards with that name.

MH1.flavor: From its cocoon, a flurry takes flight.
MH1.name: Chillerpillar
MH1.text:
{4}{S}{S}: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Chillerpillar is monstrous, it has flying.

MH1.flavor: A wizard can be outnumbered but never outsmarted.
MH1.name: Choking Tethers
MH1.text:
Tap up to four target creatures.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Choking Tethers, you may tap target creature.

MH1.name: Collected Conjuring
MH1.text: Exile the top six cards of your library. You may cast up to two sorcery cards with converted mana cost 3 or less from among them without paying their mana cost. Put the exiled cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

MH1.flavor:
"Shoo, you little worm tails—go away! My corpses aren't your dinner!"
—Ghoulcaller Gisa
MH1.name: Crypt Rats
MH1.text: {X}: Crypt Rats deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana on X.

MH1.name: Deep Forest Hermit
MH1.text:
Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Deep Forest Hermit enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens.
Squirrels you control get +1/+1.

MH1.flavor:
"Always give your foes a choice when they have none."
 — Ob Nixilis
MH1.name: Diabolic Edict
MH1.text: Target player sacrifices a creature.

MH1.flavor:
"What cannot be destroyed will be bound, but do try to destroy it the first time"
- Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors
MH1.name: Dismantling Blow
MH1.text:
Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, draw two cards.

MH1.name: Dregscape Sliver
MH1.text:
Each Sliver creature card in your graveyard has unearth {2}.
Unearth {2} ({2}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

MH1.flavor: Fail to respect the forest and you will fertilize it.
MH1.name: Elvish Fury
MH1.text:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

MH1.flavor:
"I don't have time for you right now."
—Teferi
MH1.name: Exclude
MH1.text:
Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.

MH1.flavor: "Every choice is a joy."
MH1.name: Fact or Fiction
MH1.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

MH1.name: Fiery Islet
MH1.text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {U} or {R}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Fiery Islet: Draw a card.

MH1.flavor: "There's more where that came from!"
MH1.name: Firebolt
MH1.text:
Firebolt deals 2 damage to any target.
Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

MH1.flavor:
"Fire has always been my most faithful companion."
—Jared Carthalion
MH1.name: Fists of Flame
MH1.text: Draw a card. Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +1/+0 for each card you've drawn this turn.

MH1.name: Flusterstorm
MH1.text:
Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

MH1.name: Force of Despair
MH1.text:
If it's not your turn, you may exile a black card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy all creatures that entered the battlefield this turn.

MH1.flavor: "Try, if you must."
MH1.name: Force of Negation
MH1.text:
If it's not your turn, you may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target noncreature spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

MH1.flavor: The vines overgrew the construct, snapping gears and soaking up aether.
MH1.name: Force of Vigor
MH1.text:
If it's not your turn, you may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy up to two target artifacts and/or enchantments.

MH1.name: Force of Virtue
MH1.text:
If it's not your turn, you may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Flash
Creatures you control get +1/+1.

MH1.flavor: She provides marks of protection to those she chooses as family.
MH1.name: Giver of Runes
MH1.text: {T}: Another target creature you control gains protection from colorless or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

MH1.name: Goblin Engineer
MH1.text:
When Goblin Engineer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle your library.
{R}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Return target artifact card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

MH1.flavor: A mother only a child could love.
MH1.name: Goblin Matron
MH1.text: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

MH1.name: Goblin War Party
MH1.text:
Choose one —
• Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.
Entwine {2}{R} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

MH1.flavor: No tongue to chant, yet the forsaken hymn still emanates from its body.
MH1.name: Headless Specter
MH1.text:
Flying
Hellbent — Whenever Headless Specter deals combat damage to a player, if you have no cards in hand, that player discards a card at random.

MH1.name: Ice-Fang Coatl
MH1.text:
Flash
Flying
When Ice-Fang Coatl enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Ice-Fang Coatl has deathtouch as long as you control at least three other snow permanents.

MH1.name: Impostor of the Sixth Pride
MH1.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

MH1.flavor:
"Small outbursts are healthy."
—Koth of the Hammer
MH1.name: Lava Dart
MH1.text:
Lava Dart deals 1 damage to any target.
Flashback—Sacrifice a Mountain. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

MH1.flavor: Warm enough to incubate eggs or incinerate those who would eat them.
MH1.name: Lavabelly Sliver
MH1.text: Sliver creatures you control have "When this creature enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 1 life."

MH1.name: Lightning Skelemental
MH1.text:
Trample, haste
Whenever Lightning Skelemental deals combat damage to a player, that player discards two cards.
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Lightning Skelemental.

MH1.flavor:
"Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher
MH1.name: Man-o'-War
MH1.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

MH1.name: Martyr's Soul
MH1.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of the creature's color.)
When Martyr's Soul enters the battlefield, if you control no tapped lands, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

MH1.name: Morophon, the Boundless
MH1.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
As Morophon, the Boundless enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.
Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

MH1.flavor: When dealing with goblins, if it isn't nailed down, it's headed your way.
MH1.name: Munitions Expert
MH1.text:
Flash
When Munitions Expert enters the battlefield, you may have it deal damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the number of Goblins you control.

MH1.flavor: One thread connected all the travellers' stories: the ferocity of the mongoose.
MH1.name: Nimble Mongoose
MH1.text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Threshold — Nimble Mongoose gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

MH1.flavor: New life is born within its shadows.
MH1.name: Nurturing Peatland
MH1.text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B} or {G}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Nurturing Peatland: Draw a card.

MH1.flavor: "Told you I had friends."
MH1.name: Planebound Accomplice
MH1.text: {R}: You may put a planeswalker card from your hand onto the battlefield. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

MH1.flavor: "Never leave the future to fate."
MH1.name: Pondering Mage
MH1.text: When Pondering Mage enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library. Draw a card.

MH1.flavor: There is beauty in the uncertainty of potential.
MH1.name: Prismatic Vista
MH1.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Prismatic View: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

MH1.name: Prohibit
MH1.text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is 2 or less. If this spell was kicked, counter that spell if its converted mana cost is 4 or less instead.

MH1.name: Ranger-Captain of Eos
MH1.text:
When Ranger-Captain of Eos enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
Sacrifice Ranger-Captain of Eos: Your opponents can't cast noncreature spells this turn.

MH1.name: Regrowth
MH1.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

MH1.flavor: Nine generations of metalworking skill are no match for nine hundred pounds of rage.
MH1.name: Savage Swipe
MH1.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn if its power is 2. Then it fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

MH1.flavor: Searching the future for answers often leads to further questions.
MH1.name: Scour All Possibilities
MH1.text:
Scry 2, then draw a card.
Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

MH1.name: Scrapyard Recombiner
MH1.text:
Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Search your library for a Construct card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

MH1.name: Seasoned Pyromancer
MH1.text:
When Seasoned Pyromancer enters the battlefield, discard two cards, then draw two cards. For each nonland card discarded this way, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.
{3}{R}{R}, Exile Seasoned Pyromancer from your graveyard: Create two 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens.

MH1.name: Serra the Benevolent
MH1.text:
+2: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1 until end of turn.
-3: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance.
-6: You get an emblem with "If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead."

MH1.flavor: The expedition's end began the marsh's story.
MH1.name: Silent Clearing
MH1.text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {W} or {B}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Silent Clearing: Draw a card.

MH1.flavor: A progenitor of tadpoles and allergies in equal measure.
MH1.name: Spore Frog
MH1.text: Sacrifice Spore Frog: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

MH1.name: Stream of Thought
MH1.text:
Target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. You shuffle up to four cards from your graveyard into your library.
Replicate {2}{U}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid the replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

MH1.flavor: Since the river ran dry, travels wander where fish once swam.
MH1.name: Sunbaked Canyon
MH1.text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R} or {W}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Sunbaked Canyon: Draw a card.

MH1.flavor: The question isn't whether slivers will adapt to a world's perils but whether the world's perils will adapt to slivers.
MH1.name: Tempered Sliver
MH1.text: Sliver creatures you control have "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it."

MH1.name: The First Sliver
MH1.text:
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
Sliver spells you cast have cascade.

MH1.flavor:
"To see past the veil of death, cross it."
-*The Red Book of Mezdrithalik
MH1.name: Undead Augur
MH1.text: Whenever Undead Augur or another Zombie you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

MH1.name: Urza, Lord High Artificer
MH1.text:
When Urza, Lord High Artificer enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."
Tap an untapped artifact you control: Add {U}.
{5}: Shuffle your library, then exile the top card. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.

MH1.flavor: It doesn't contain venom. It is venom.
MH1.name: Venomous Changeling
MH1.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Deathtouch

MH1.flavor: Families of the fallen donate the swords of their loved ones to bolster the city's defenses.
MH1.name: Wall of One Thousand Cuts
MH1.text:
Defender, flying
{W}: Wall of One Thousand Cuts can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

MH1.flavor: The trees pull water from deep underground, filling the forest for miles.
MH1.name: Waterlogged Grove
MH1.text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {U}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Waterlogged Grove: Draw a card.

MH1.flavor: Her feathers cut the air, as sharp as they are silent.
MH1.name: Wing Shards
MH1.text:
Target player sacrifices an attacking creature.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

SS2.flavor: A weapon of evil, redeemed in Gideon's hand.
SS2.name: Blackblade Reforged
Gideon Jura
SS2.text:
+2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able.
−2: Destroy target tapped creature.
0: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

SS2.flavor: "One life at a time. That is how the world will be saved."
SS2.name: Martyr's Bond
SS2.text: Whenever Martyr's Bond or another nonland permanent you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent that shares a card type with it.

SS2.name: Path to Exile
SS2.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.

SS2.name: Rest in Peace
SS2.text:
When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards.
If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

SS2.name: Shielded by Faith
SS2.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has indestructible.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may attach Shielded by Faith to that creature.

SS2.flavor: "Heroism is more than a single act; it is hundreds of small decisions, made every day, in pursuit of a heroic cause."
SS2.name: True Conviction
SS2.text: Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.

SS2.flavor: Even after all that befell Amonkhet, Gideon never believed that his trust in Oketra was misplaced.
SS2.name: Worship
SS2.text: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
